title.rendered: Carjack Fail

content.rendered: This footage is of a carjacking foiled by an idiot and a manual transmission. The crook pulls a gun on the car owner and jumps in the driver’s seat. This is when the panic sets in…it’s a stick-shift. The truck is jerking and rocking like prom night. He finally gives up and bails. The moral of this story is, if you plan to steal a car, please know how to drive it.

title.rendered: Huge Python Under the Hood (20 Feet)

content.rendered: My grandmother dragged me on safari with her singles group. Things were pretty lame until this freaking huge a$$ snake crawled up in Barbara Ann’s car. They were handing out fresh Depends left and right. Best trip ever. Thanks, Nana.

content.rendered: Need to dig some ditches? Maybe fight zombies in a post apocalyptic world? This is the machine for you. It is apparently called a “Disc Trencher” and I am pretty sure everyone is going to want one of these. #1 on my list of stuff I need.

title.rendered: Buy Your Own Street Legal Tron Cycle

content.rendered: Parker Brothers Concepts in Melbourne, Fl have created a street legal, electric Tron Cycle. With a top speed of 100mph and 80 miles on a charge, the starting price of $55,000 seems reasonable. We can’t wait to see these on the road. The one in the video appears to be a police bike. Is there C.H.I.P.S 2016 reboot in the making?

title.rendered: Criminal Pits Cop Before Crashing

content.rendered: During an extremely dangerous high speed chase, this criminal pulled some moves against the Houston police department! He’s being chased down the highway by cruisers and SUVs when he comes up on an officer’s car and sends him into the median wall! The cruiser tumbled end-over-end like a stunt from a movie. The suspect eventually is over-taken by another officer who barrels into him.

title.rendered: The Perfect Response When You are Almost Run Over

content.rendered:
This helmet cam footage comes to us from the Grimsel Pass in Switzerland. This biker was cruising along, minding his own business on a sunny drive when he was nearly hit by oncoming traffic. The car in question was trying to pass a slower driver and didn’t see this biker in the other lane. So what’s the proper way to let them know you acknowledge their inability to drive safely?

Well, it’s just this one simple gesture.

title.rendered: The Monowheel

content.rendered: We’re not entirely certain who came up with this, but we love it! It’s called the Monowheel and is something out of a Twisted Metal game or a Mad Max movie. It handles acceleration and deceleration like a motorcycle and uses the driver’s body leaning to turn. It may not be the most useful “vehicle” to drive, but it’s definitely one of the most unique!

title.rendered: The Chainsaw Motorcycle

content.rendered: Leave it to the Germans to find new and creative ways to craft custom engines! This incredible chainsaw motorcycle is powered by 24 separate chainsaws! Sure, it takes a few minutes to fire the whole thing up, but once it gets going it commands attention!

title.rendered: Homemade Supercharged Straight Eight Engine!

content.rendered: Chris Ireland created this monster in his own shed! He began by fusing two NSU engines and finished it off by throwing a supercharger on top! It took six months of determination, sweat, and a lot of frustration, but he finished it! Check it out as he fires it up for the first time!

title.rendered: Can You Bring a Semi Back From The Dead?

content.rendered: Ryder has challenged itself by starting “Project Rebirth.” They’re aiming to completely destroy a semi then build it back from the ground up. They’ve taken a modern Volvo semi rig and run it through a gauntlet of destruction. Once the truck has been pronounced completely dead, they move the remains to a Ryder facility and give them only 24 hours to bring it back to life!

category.name: Grab Bag
category.description: Random, sometimes shocking, and usually for the lulz

title.rendered: Get Scared Into Always Wearing Your Seat Belt

content.rendered:
People still like to complain about having to wear seat belts. Sure, they can be uncomfortable or leave bruises if you are in an accident; however, the alternative is far worse!

Just watch this ’98 Expedition Rollover crash test video. Take a look at what happens to bodies inside a vehicle who aren’t strapped in. As this car, any car for that matter, spins and flips all over the road you can see how easily a human body can fly out the window and even land in the path of the crash!

People still like to complain about having to wear seat belts. Sure, they can be uncomfortable or leave bruises if you are in an accident; however, the alternative is far worse! Just watch this ’98 Expedition Rollover crash test video. Take a look at what happens to bodies inside a vehicle who aren’t strapped in.

Read More

facebook_message: If this doesn't convince you to wear a seat belt then nothing will!

title.rendered: Volvo Turbo Diesel Looks Like a Nightmare, Drives Like a Dream

content.rendered: This ’82 Volvo may look like it’s seen better days, but once the engine turns over, you’ll know it’s in its prime. It has all the signs of a well loved user mod: paint damage, missing locks, broken blinkers, used tires, and a massive hood exhaust in all its turbo diesel glory. You don’t drive something like this for looks, you drive it for the love of diesel fumes, black grease under your fingernails, and the looks of bystanders as you go roaring by.

title.rendered: The Beautiful Sound and Looks of the 1970 Plymouth Barracuda

content.rendered: Jamboolio was out catching footage during the “Helsinki Cruising Night” and “Loviisa Burnout” events (both of which take place in Finland) when they caught footage of some classic American muscle. It’s the 1970 Plymouth Barracuda, and it’s exactly as beautiful to look at as it is to listen to! This Pro Touring Plymouth Barracuda has a supercharged 7.2L 440 Big Block V8 engine that puts out 550 HP!

title.rendered: 9 Times – Epic Porsche Barrel Roll

content.rendered: We really hate seeing such a beautiful car come to such an unfortunate end, and in the first lap too. Luckily, 17-year-old Pedro Piquet, son of former Formula 1 driver Nelson Piquet, walked away with just some minor injuries. Nine rolls, watch the slow motion. Epic crash.

title.rendered: Chevy Corvette Z06 C5 VS. Ford Mustang GT – Tug of War

content.rendered:
Few auto rivalries are as heated and long running as Ford versus Chevy. They’ve been competing for decades. This video shows them going head-to-head in a tug of war!

Most tug of wars are fought between trucks or tractors. They test all out torque, traction and general HP against each other. This time, we’re seeing a Corvette and a Mustang GT attempt the same!

title.rendered: Drag Race: Mustang Beats Corvette and Itself

content.rendered: This crash happened in Ohio. The Mustang comes like a bat out of hell while the Corvette takes a more “slow and steady wins the race” approach. The Mustang is certainly faster but you can’t exactly the say the driver won.

title.rendered: Gas Pump Fireball!

content.rendered: If a gas pump should catch fire, never pull the pump out of the car! It only provides more oxygen for the fire and makes everything about 1,000 times worse!

excerpt.rendered: If a gas pump should catch fire, never pull the pump out of the car! It only provides more oxygen for the fire and makes everything about 1,000 times worse!

title.rendered: Police Seize Corvette in a Drug Bust and Keep it. And Drive it.

content.rendered:
How did this Vette not cost the taxpayers a dime? It was seized during a drug bust.

Greenville Interim Police Chief Ted Sauls has a message for other drug dealers that might be out there: “When you have what I like to call fruit of the poisonous tree, (when you’re doing illegal activity), you can often buy a car like this. The message I want to send is…we’ll take it.” And apparently keep it, drive it, and tell everybody about it.

title.rendered: Astonishingly Brutal Crash on the ‘Ring

content.rendered:
The Nurburgring is a well known track that claims dozens of cars each year. Many take their dash cams with them to record their times and work on their racing, but they also get incredible footage of less fortunate and less skilled drivers causing massive wrecks.

This footage shows someone screaming ahead of the cammer as they’ve lost control and slamming into the side wall. The wall then actually pops them up into the air for 15 yards before they hit the ground!

title.rendered: What to Look for in a Vintage 1969 Pontiac GTO

content.rendered:
There was a time when Pontiac helped create some of the most beautiful and iconic American autos to date! One such model is the classic 1969 Pontiac GTO!

Maybe you’d like to find a GTO one day and call it your’s. But what do you look out for when buying a classic car? Buying any car, from licensed dealers to private sellers, can be a tricky game with plenty of pitfalls to navigate. Check out this appraiser going over this ’69 GTO and get an inside look at what to be suspicious of and what to double and triple check before throwing your hard earned cash at a classic ride!

title.rendered: The Most Incredible GTA Truck Stunt You’ll Ever See

content.rendered: Blacksmoke Billy is a Grand Theft Auto 5 player who knows every single aspect of the game and how to pull off the most incredible stunts. He’s consistently pulling off one-of-a-kind tricks with semi trucks in the game and his latest is another one for the books!
